## Setup

Note, theme_custom() is called from a redirect where the raw file path from Github is: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AJThurston/dataviz/refs/heads/main/theme/theme.r

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
devtools::source_url("ajthurston.com/theme")
```

## Data
```{r data}
dat <- data.frame(values = as.factor(c(rep(0,6),rep(1,9))))
```

## Plot

```{r plot}
ggplot(dat, aes(x = values)) +
  geom_bar() #+
  # labs(x = "Values", y = "Frequency") +
  # scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,10), breaks = c(0:10), expand = c(0,0))# +
  # theme_custom()
```
